attributes.action: REQUIRE AN EMPLOYER TO GIVE A REASON WHY THEY DID NOT EMPLOY AN INTERVIEWEE FOR A JOB.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Employers sometimes ask strange questions when applicants attend an interview for a job. 
If the job is not awarded they should be required to answer in writing any suggestion of bias.

government_responses.details:
